abstract: Rafael Nadal has regained footing in lead-up to French Open, though Novak Djokovic remains favored to win; Djokovic himself has acknowledged that Nadal is world's premier clay-court player.

headline.print_headline: Nadal’s Resurrection on Clay Courts Builds Confidence Before French Open
headline.main: After Last Year’s Slip, Nadal Again Finds Firm Footing on Clay

snippet: Coming off his least successful season on his favorite surface in more than a decade, Rafael Nadal has won two events on clay and has his sights set on the Madrid Open and the French Open.
lead_paragraph: Coming off his least successful season on his favorite surface in more than a decade, Rafael Nadal has won two events on clay and has his sights set on the Madrid Open and the French Open.
